meanings.definition: A type of bird with a thick bill and a short tail.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of hawfinches at the park.
meanings.sent3: The hawfinches had a meeting to discuss their next meal.
meanings.sent4: The hawfinches' bills were like tiny garden shovels.
meanings.sent5: The hawfinches chirped cheerfully in the morning.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'hawfinch', referring to more than one of these birds.
meanings.sent1: Many hawfinches flew across the sky.
meanings.sent2: The hawfinches perched on the branches together.
meanings.sent3: The hawfinches held a singing competition.
meanings.sent4: The hawfinches' flock resembled a moving patch of red.
meanings.sent5: The hawfinches' feathers glistened in the sunlight.
